mapper.insert: insert into user (uId, uName, uPhone, uEmail, uPassword, uFavor, uMoney, uStar,uProblem1,uQuestion1,uProblem2,uQuestion2) values (#{uId},#{uName},#{uPhone},#{uEmail},#{uPassword},#{uFavor},#{uMoney},#{uStar},#{uProblem1},#{uQuestion1},#{uProblem2},#{uQuestion2})
mapper.select: SELECT uId,uName,uPhone,uEmail,uPassword,uFavor,uMoney,uStar FROM user WHERE uPhone=#{uPhone} AND uPassword=#{uPassword}
